hymn.title: Already dead! And buried too
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C F/C C - | C - F - | G - G7 - | C - - - | C F/C C - | C - F - | G G7 C - |

layout.singingstanza: Al -- rea -- dy dead! And bur -- ied too! With the old man I am through! Al -- rea -- dy dead! And bur -- ied too! With the old man I am through!

lyrics.stanza: Already dead! And buried too! With the old man I am through! Already dead! And buried too! With the old man I am through!
No longer I! No longer I! Christ in me I'll testify! No longer I! No longer I! Christ in me I'll testify!
